CatDescriptText: Cutline of related article published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 31, 1953, pg. 3 reads: "Servel Show Entertains Dealers, Press; Tells Them of Ice-Making Innovations...Servel's big "Show of Stars" at Syria Mosque last Friday afternoon was that and more when Servel presented an all-star Broadway cast to introduce its new 1953 line of gas and electrical products to this area..."
TitMainTitle: Two women, one wearing long sequined dress with center slit and single sleeve, standing beside refrigerator with sign reading "Servel refrigerator, ice-maker model 1139c, Price $589.50", at Servel product show in Syria Mosque
